Text.Page:
It's another of Dakuryon's lab notes.

"Lab Report ADE-1114

The process is inefficient. Weak specimens perish before I am able to finish my experiments. The machine needs adjustments. That will take some time, but meanwhile, I can use a couple of my guards as new specimens..."

Lab Report ADE-1115

Success. Vera and Prima endured the process better than expected: Vera took in 120 units, and Prima took in 100. Vera is a near perfection, while Prima seems to be lacking rudimentary physical durability...

Still, Prima's 'Acid Attack' can knock opponents back with significant force, so perhaps the lack of durability is a blessing in disguise. But I think I would have preferred to duplicate Vera's 'Noxious Fumes' effect. It's rather formidable..."
